page.title: 10HOME LIFE.
page.content: At a quarter to nine I go to school. When Emma is not going to the nursery she comes with us.Sometimes I walk down with Kelly and Mum.I run on with Kelly and then we stop under a tree to wait for Mummy.When we get to school I take my coat off to play with Emma until the bell rings.Not many cars come along.In front of our house we have a lawn,and beside it we have a path.We don't have much of a path,but when we get close to the school there are more pavements.Most roads around North Newton don't have any white lines. By Julie Wilmot
